scripts.build: npm run build:contract && npm run build:web
scripts.build:contract: npm run build:contract:market && npm run build:contract:nft
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit:marketplace && npm run test:unit:nft
scripts.test:integration: npm run build:contract && cd integration-tests && cargo run --example integration-tests "../contract/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/nft_cyfer.wasm"
scripts.postinstall: cd frontend && npm install && cd .. && echo rs tests && echo rs contract
